topic.title: Georg Soros(Jew) enjoyed to confiscate Jewish property in WWII
topic.body:
Opportunistic and Sociopathic Jew Georg Soros enjoyed helping Nazis to confiscate Jewish property in WWII - according to a forgotten interview from 1998.
http://www.nowtheendbegins.com/proof-george-soros-nazi-past-finally-comes-light-discovery-forgotten-interview/
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Soros
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1Qr7TnWG74

KROFT: Went out, in fact, and helped in the confiscation of property from your fellow Jews, friends and neighbors.
SOROS: Yes. Thatâ€™s right. Yes.

KROFT: I mean, that sounds like an experience that would send lots of people to the psychiatric couch for many, many, years. Was it difficult?
SOROS: No, not at all. Not at all, I rather enjoyed it.

KROFT: No feelings of guilt?
SOROS: No, only feelings of absolute power.
